Main

Jordy van Langen {#title}
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------


```{r}
intro_text <- "I am a recent graduate from the research master [‘Behavioural Science’](https://www.ru.nl/opleidingen/master/behavioural-science-research/) at Radboud University Nijmegen. I performed my masters internship at the [Systems Neurology](https://www.ru.nl/donders/research/theme-2-perception-action-control/research-groups-theme-2/systems-neurology/) group in the Donders Centre for Cognitive Neuroimaging which is part of the [Donders Institute for Brain, Cognition and Behaviour](https://www.ru.nl/donders). In my master thesis research, I investigated the influence of different types of stress on Parkinon’s tremor and related noradrenergic activity. From November 2019, I will be working as a research assisstant at the [Brain and Mind Centre](https://sydney.edu.au/brain-mind/), University of Sydney, in Australia."

cat(sanitize_links(intro_text))
```
